snippet: Detroit faces being assigned an emergency manager because of its $12 billion debt, and efforts to find an alternative solution were snarled in legal and political battles late Tuesday.
abstract: Detroit faces being assigned an emergency manager or plunging into default because of its $12 billion debt, and efforts to find an alternative solution are snarled in legal and political battles; hopes of avoiding miserable options are pinned on consent agreement with the state of Michigan, but some view agreement as an attack on unions.
lead_paragraph: Detroit faces being assigned an emergency manager because of its $12 billion debt, and efforts to find an alternative solution were snarled in legal and political battles late Tuesday.

headline.seo: Detroit Struggles With Financial Rescue Plan
headline.main: Detroit, Staggering With Debt, Now Struggles With a Rescue Plan
headline.print_headline: Detroit, Staggering With Debt, Now Struggles With a Rescue Plan
